select b.id, b.group_id, b.user_id, b.operator_id, b.type, b.reason, b.expire_time, b.is_active, b.create_time, b.update_time, g.name as group_name, u.username as user_name, u.nickname as user_nickname, op.username as operator_name from im_group_blacklist b left join im_group g on b.group_id = g.id left join im_user u on b.user_id = u.id left join im_user op on b.operator_id = op.id
mapper.select: where b.group_id = #{groupId} and b.is_active = 1 order by b.create_time desc
select count(*) from im_group_blacklist where group_id = #{groupId} and user_id = #{userId} and type = #{type} and is_active = 1 and (expire_time is null or expire_time > NOW())
